doc.title: Video Blog: ieat learns to make an Omelette
doc.text: In/IN the/DT 2nd/CD episode/NN of/IN the/DT ``/JJ ieat/NN learns/NNS to/TO cook/VB an/DT egg/NN series/NN ''/NN ,/, Chef/NN Tim/NN ,/, tells/VBZ me/PRP how/RB to/TO tell/VB if/IN an/DT egg/NN is/VBZ fresh/JJ without/IN having/VBG to/TO crack/VB it/PRP open/VB ./. -LRB-/DT Actually/RB do/VB you/PRP know/VB how/WRB to/TO tell/VB if/IN it/PRP is/VBZ fresh/JJ even/RB after/IN you/PRP crack/VB it/PRP open/JJ ?/. -RRB-/RB ./. We/PRP also/RB explore/VB how/RB to/TO make/VB a/DT French/JJ style/NN Omelette/NN ./. You/PRP might/VB think/VB you/PRP know/VB how/WRB to/TO fry/VB an/DT Omelette/NN ,/, but/CC if/IN you/PRP were/VBD ever/RB asked/VBD to/TO make/VB one/CD by/IN a/DT Western/NN Chef/NN ,/, most/NN of/IN us/PRP would/MD probably/RB fail/VB miserably/NN ./. It/PRP is/VBZ said/JJ that/IN a/DT lot/NN of/IN Head/NNP Chefs/NNP use/VB the/DT Omelette/JJ test/NN to/TO see/VB if/IN their/PRP$ new/JJ cooks/NN actually/RB know/VB how/WRB to/TO cook/VB ./. Hope/WP you/PRP have/VBP fun/VBN making/VBG Omelettes/NN for/IN breakfast/NN over/IN the/DT new/JJ year/NN break/NN ./. My/PRP$ favorite/JJ way/NN of/IN eating/VBG it/PRP is/VBZ to/TO add/VB freshly/RB grated/VBD Gruyere/NN Cheese/NN onto/IN the/DT Omelette/NN before/IN you/PRP fold/VB it/PRP and/CC then/RB putting/VB it/PRP into/IN a/DT freshly/JJ toasted/NN Croissant/NN with/IN a/DT slice/NN of/IN lightly/JJ fried/VBD smoked/VBD ham/NN and/CC slices/NNS of/IN Avacado/NN then/RB slowly/RB enjoy/VB it/PRP with/IN a/DT roasted/JJ vine/NN ripened/NN tomato/NN and/CC a/DT cup/NN of/IN Teh/NNP Tarik/NNP .../: ooooohhh/NNP ./.
